h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: With a lot of health and defense, it will take some time to chip away at this massive stone monster, but if you can avoid or deflect his big attacks and conserve your gourd uses, you’ll be able to win this endurance battle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
With a lot of health and defense, it will take some time to chip away at this massive stone monster, but if you can avoid or deflect his big attacks and conserve your gourd uses, you’ll be able to win this endurance battle.
